answer:
# Markdown Examples

## Text Formatting

This is **bold text** and this is *italic text*. You can also use ~~strikethrough~~.

## Code Examples

Here's a simple Node.js code example:

```javascript
const express = require('express');
const app = express();

app.get('/', (req, res) => {
  res.send('Hello World!');
});

app.listen(3000, () => {
  console.log('Server running on port 3000');
});
```

## Lists

### Unordered List

* Item 1
* Item 2
* Item 3

### Ordered List

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

## Links and Images

[Visit our website](https://example.com)

## Blockquotes

> This is a blockquote
> It can span multiple lines

## Tables

| Header 1 | Header 2 |
|----------|----------|
| Cell 1   | Cell 2   |
| Cell 3   | Cell 4   |
